name: Extreme Sprint 3010
synopsis: By 3010 most countries were ruled by totalitarian governments and they were in desperate need for brutal entertainment that would fulfil people's wildest desires. Extreme Sprint seemed to be a perfect solution: its rules were simple, yet it had a huge entertainment factor. The "Runner" had to complete 3 laps in specially created stadiums, while he was chased by the "Hunter". If the "Runner" was caught - he disappeared and he was never seen again...
